short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set automatic refresh time for web pages. Quite simple and just. Just enter the time and auto-refresh pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set automatic refresh time for web pages. Quite simple and just. Just enter the time and auto-refresh pages. The plugin will continue to auto-refresh even if you close the screen. The plugin can be used in multiple tabs.
